snippet: David Einhorn, the president of Greenlight Capital, won more than four times his money in a three-day tournament at the World Series of Poker in Las Vegas. He plans to donate the winnings to a charitable organization.
abstract: David Einhorn, the president of Greenlight Capital, won more than four times his money in a three-day tournament at the World Series of Poker in Las Vegas. He plans to donate the winnings to a charitable organization.

headline.main: Einhorn Finishes Third in Poker Tournament, With $4.35 Million
